messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: breastfeeding - Stephanie, B
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 00-04-09 17:44:58 EDT, you write:  Tracy, I feel lucky nursing worked out well for me since I was not
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 00-04-09 17:44:58 EDT, you write:

<<
Date: 00-04-09 17:44:58 EDT >>
Tracy,
I feel lucky nursing worked out well for me since I was not supported in the
endeavor oh so long ago when I had my first baby at 22! But I know it takes
much more than feeding method to make a good mama! Whatever a mother can
manage in her circumstances is the best she can do, and I would never judge
another mom-not after 4 children and having done many of those things I swore
I never would!
Bridget
